name: business_id
description: Unique identifier for the client company.

name: cpa_firm_id
description: CPA firm managing this client company.

name: contact_name
description: Primary contact person for the business.

name: contact_email
description: Email address of the primary contact.

name: contact_phone
description: Phone number of the primary contact.

name: city
description: City where the business is located.

name: state
description: State where the business is located.

name: created_at
description: Timestamp when the business was added.

name: updated_at
description: Timestamp when the business information was last updated.
